subject: Pigeons
Doping (Sports)
Gambling
Animal Abuse, Rights and Welfare
lead_paragraph: Pigeon racing’s followers were stunned when six Belgian birds failed tests for banned performance-enhancing drugs. It would be comical if it weren’t true.
